titles.title: WEANS Act of 2006
Withdraw Energy Addicting New Subsidies Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to repeal the ultra-deepwater and unconventional onshore natural gas and other petroleum research and development program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/7/2006--Introduced. Withdraw Energy Addicting New Subsidies Act of 2006, or the WEANS Act of 2006 - Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to repeal the program for Ultra-Deepwater and Unconventional Natural Gas and Other Petroleum Resources research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of technologies.
